pages.text: $(li)Thrashers are hostile creatures that can be found in the $(l:patchouli:biomes/overworld/snow/frozen_ocean)Frozen Oceans$(/l).$(br)$(li)They detect their preys using echolocation.$(br)$(li)When detects one prey, they quicks attack it.$(br)$(li)They may drop $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/upgrade_aquatic/thrasher_tooth)Thrasher Tooths$(/l) upon death.
$(li)It exists an even dangerous and rarely version of this creature known as the $(l)Great Thrasher$().
